recipe.title: Crostini with Spicy Green Olivada
ingredients: 1/4 cup coarsely chopped pitted Kalamata olives or other brine-cured black olives
instructions: Finely chop first 6 ingredients in processor. Blend in 5 tablespoons oil. Transfer to small bowl. (Can be made 2 days ahead. Cover and refrigerate. Bring to room temperature before using.) Preheat oven to 400°F. Arrange bread slices on large baking sheet. Brush with 2 tablespoons oil. Bake until crisp and golden, about 13 minutes. Cool completely. (Can be made 1 day ahead. Store airtight at room temperature.) Spread olive mixture onto toasts. Sprinkle with Kalamata olives and serve.
